artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a woman on the left in a pink gown with a green overgown, a large pink sash from her waist to the floor, and a pink and white polka dot hat with white and pink plumes; in the center are two elaborate women's hats; on the right in black and white is a woman with a spear and shield wearing a helmet with a candelabra with three lit candles at the top
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Treizième Cahier, 20 Mars 1788
